basics.name: Gaurav Manglani
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Versatile Software Engineer with strong experience in developing scalable solutions, particularly in fast-paced environments. Proficient in back-end development, specializing in performance optimization and infrastructure design.

work.name: Cisco
work.description: Leading technology company focused on enhancing network solutions.
work.summary:
- Designed and architected high-availability, customer-facing services to enhance user experience and scalability.
- Led implementation efforts using agile methodologies to deliver robust and efficient code solutions.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of features and deployed services using CI/CD pipelines.
highlights: Enhanced system performance, achieving a 30% increase in efficiency through code optimization.
Successfully led a project focused on implementing scalable solutions across multiple platforms.

work.name: Conductor
work.description: Innovative company transforming search engine results parsing.
work.summary:
- Developed an ML-driven solution to replace the SERP parser, gaining insights into client rankings.
- Extensively utilized Java and Spark to extract data and implemented a Random Forest Model.
highlights: The project laid the foundation for advancing their core architecture.
Used Spark's ML libraries for feature extraction enhancing data processing speed.

education.description: Focus on back-end web development, programming, and technical architecture.

projects.name: USC Compiler
projects.description: Built a compiler for a simplified version of C using LLVM API, including a lexical analyzer and parser.
highlights: Successfully integrated multiple components including semantic and code optimizers.
Achieved efficient translation from high-level code to machine code.
